duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete individual tax returns and ensure compliance with IRS and state requirements.
Communicate effectively in person and in writing in a fast-paced environment.
Stay updated with tax laws and regulations to provide accurate tax planning and audit support.
Sales and marketing of tax services to potential clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA preferred)
H&R Block Tax Knowledge Assessment or Income Tax Course completion
